label: Cao, Yanghui & Ya-Lin Zhang.  2013. Two new erythroneurine leafhopper genera and first record of Thailus Mahmood from China (Hemiptera: Cicadellidae: Typhlocybinae), with description of four new species. Zootaxa 3686(3): 363–372.
